Actually, the old one was a courtesan, trading having her unmatched beauty on a noble's arm (and possibly elsewhere if she liked him) for government secrets and espionage. Between her and her sister, Katarina, their father had two options to present to enemies: the sweet words of Cassiopiea  whispered in their ears or the sharp blade of Katarina slitting their throat.
